# Welcome to Quarto

### An open-souce scientific and technical publishing system built on Pandoc {.fw-light} 

<a href="docs/getting-started/" role="button" class="btn btn-success btn-lg">Get Started</a>
<a href="docs/guide/" role="button" class="btn btn-info btn-lg">Guide</a>

::: 

::: {.g-col-lg-6 .g-col-12 .fw-light }

#### Scientific publishing with Quarto {style="margin-top: 5px;"}

- #####  Use markdown extensions for technical writing including equations, citations, cross-references, sub-figures, layout panels, callouts, and more. {.fw-light}

- ##### Embed code and output from Python, R, and JavaScript via integration with [Jupyter](https://jupyter.org/), [Knitr](https://yihui.org/knitr/), and [Observable](https://github.com/observablehq/). {.fw-light}

- ##### Publish high quality documents, reports, presentations, websites, and books in mutliple formats (HTML, PDF, Office, ePub, and more). {.fw-light}
:::
